name: K8sDeploy.dev
description: K8sDeploy is a tool to deploy your Kubernetes applications. That works on x86 and ARM.
fullDesc: K8sDeploy the easy deployment system that runs on x86 and ARM.

name: BugFix.es
description: BugFix.es is a bug and issue creator that generates off your codes issues.
fullDesc:
BugFix.es is a system to get visibility on your bugs and issues without having to read through all the logs.

Bugs and Issues are automatically generated by your code, but some are more important than others, so why not let the frequency decide how important.

name: Retro-Board.it
description: Retro-Board.it is a retro-board the way a retro-board is supposed to work.
fullDesc: A retro-board working the way a retro-board should.

name: FruitStall.net
description: FruitStall is a stock management system that doesn't suck.
fullDesc: Fruitstall is a stock tracking system, without needing training on how to use it.

name: TrackLin.es
description: An issue tracking system that doesn't require training to use.
fullDesc: TrackLin.es is a bug and issue tracker like Jira but without the headaches.

name: Todo-List.app
description: Todo-List is a ... that works across all systems natively
fullDesc:
Todo-List is a ... that works across all systems natively

  • Web
  • Android
  • iOS
  • ipadOS
  • Windows
  • macOS
  • Linux (Wayland {sway})

Initial launch will be Web and Linux
